name: Castle Guardian
description:
Castle Guardian is a game where you play as a castle guard in fantastic medieval era.
It is a tower defense game. Armies of skeletons and monsters only
you can protect. Fight to fend off armies, enhance up your character and Centaur wingman!

Tower Defense War!


To repulse hordes of skeletons and monsters
set traps and fight your sidekick, the Centaur!

Empower Your Character and Your Wingman!


Get Items and Special powers for your character in the Market section
Evolve the Helper Centaur!

Epic Boss Battles


Use your strategy to take down huge monsters.

Enemy Armies!


Consisting of skeletons and monsters, more and more as the wave level increases.
Defend against hordes of powerful enemies!

New Campaigns!


Fight new hordes of monsters by going to different campaigns!

Special Powers!


Use special powers to fend off armies of enemies!

Market Section!


You can buy talents and items from the market section to upgrade
your castle, yourself and centaur!

End Game Reward!


At the end of the game, whether you lose or win, character appearance or
You can earn gold!

Capsule Opening!


You can win prizes by opening capsules for 50 gold in the capsule open section of the menu!
